item.description:
Join members and guests of the SSFMG for a Walk along Wollaston Beach! Depending on the size of the group and speed of walkers, we can have a couple of small (or big) groups so everyone can buddy up. Hopefully the weather will work out and we'll have a great night!

If you have any questions about this event, please contact me (Julie). THANKS!

About Wollaston Beach:

Wollaston Beach can be accessed from many points. The best way to get to our meeting place is to get off 93N at Exit 8 (Furnace Brook Parkway), exit ramp rotary following small green sign for Furnace Brook Parkway, and follow Furnace Brook Parkway for 2.9 miles. Furnace Brook Parkway ends at Wollaston Beach, and you take a left onto Quincy Shore Drive. After only 0.2 (two-tenths) miles, our meeting place comes up on the left. The parking lot for Caddy Park has a small footbridge and a flag poll that are visible from the main road.


Wollaston Beach Walk
Wednesday, June 24th, 2009 @ 6pm
Caddy Memorial Park
Quincy Shore Drive
Quincy, MA

Event Fees: Organizer Team and Annual Members - Free, Members and Guests - $2 per person (Cash Only. Please try to bring exact change. No large bills please.)

Organizer(s): Julie O

Min/Max: At least 6 Yes RSVPs by Noon on Wednesday, June 24th. Attendance is unlimited.

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by 3pm on Wednesday, June 24th.

Inclement Weather:
We will walk if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Check back here on Wednesday for an update if the weather is questionable. All Yes RSVPs will be emailed by 4pm if the event is canceled due to the weather.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Posted on the "Directions to Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: I drive a blue chevy cobolt and I will be right by the flag pole at the park

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Summer evening walk
